Use Tektur font

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
palmerpenguins::penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, col = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = 'This is a title') +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(
      size = 42, 
      family = 'Tektur', 
      face = 'bold'
    )
  ) 
```

Annotate FontAwesome Heart

```{r}
palmerpenguins::penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, col = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = 'This is a title') +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(
      size = 42, 
      family = 'Tektur', 
      face = 'bold'
    )
  ) +
  annotate(
    'text',
    x = 55,
    y = 175,
    label = 'heart',
    family = 'Font Awesome 6 Free',
    color = 'firebrick4',
    size = 25
  )
```

Find fonts

```{r}
systemfonts::system_fonts() |> 
  filter(str_detect(name, 'Awesome')) |> 
  select(name, family, style, path)

#   name                       family                style   path

```

Use solid heart (after registration)

```{r}
systemfonts::system_fonts() |> 
  filter(str_detect(name, 'Awesome'), style == 'Solid') |> 
  pull(path) |> 
  systemfonts::register_font(
    'Font Awesome 6 Free Solid',
    plain = _
  )

palmerpenguins::penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, col = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = 'This is a title') +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(
      size = 42, 
      family = 'Tektur', 
      face = 'bold'
    )
  ) +
  annotate(
    'text',
    x = 55,
    y = 175,
    label = 'heart',
    family = 'Font Awesome 6 Free Solid',
    color = 'firebrick4',
    size = 25
  )

```
